albums.name: Blunk
albums.bio: While the issues Browne tackles on the album are often sweeping and existential, he writes on a far more intimate scale, consistently zeroing in on the human experience at the heart of it all. Whether singing about a Catholic priest navigating the slums of Haiti on his motorbike or a young Mexican woman who’s risked everything in pursuit of a better life across the border, Browne manages to tap into a universal emotional language, one that makes the old feel new and the foreign feel familiar.

albums.name: Diferente

art.alt: Adventureson's Doom As I Say Not As I Doom

albums.bio: Despite his success, Browne’s never been one to rest on his laurels, and as ‘Downhill From Everywhere’ proves, he’s still pushing himself some 15 albums into his storied career. Recorded with a core band that included guitarists Greg Leisz (Eric Clapton, Bill Frisell) and Val McCallum (Lucinda Williams, Sheryl Crow), bassist Bob Glaub (Linda Ronstadt, CSNY, John Fogerty), keyboardist Jeff Young (Sting, Shawn Colvin), and drummer Mauricio Lewak (Sugarland, Melissa Etheridge), the record is a truly collaborative work, one driven by group chemistry and an openness to new sounds and ideas.

tracks.name: Diferente
tracks.lyrics: In my eyes, indisposed In disguises no one knows Hides the face, lies the snake In the sun in my disgrace Boiling heat, summer stench 'Neath the black the sky looks dead Call my name through the cream And I'll hear you scream again

tracks.name: El Banquete
tracks.lyrics: Donec semper metus nec neque gravida consectetur. Duis scelerisque, tortor non sollicitudin tempor, est lorem accumsan lectus, pharetra ultricies mi felis vel lacus. Pellentesque tempor urna porta, ultricies lectus non, ornare lorem. Mauris vitae orci et neque faucibus dignissim. Fusce ultricies rhoncus iaculis. Vestibulum quis maximus lacus. Cras non sollicitudin risus, at interdum purus.

tracks.name: Adicciones
tracks.lyrics:
• Yellow butterfly singing up the river.
  • Opening her wings, caressing the sky
  • Playing within the water in this sunny morning

[Chorus Mantra]

  • I say yeah yeah yeah
  • Lift me up to touch the sky
  • The way, like a snake, trees are dancing.
  • The smell of water purifies my soul
  • I feel the roots, this is my home town.

[Chorus Mantra]

  • I say yeah yeah yeah
  • Lift me up to touch the sky

tracks.name: Animal Ancestral
tracks.lyrics:
• Yo seré
  • tu voz en este mundo voyeur
  • Navegaré
  • Entre redes infiltrándome
  • Normalizaré rarezas tecnológicas
  • Y a cada paso
  • algún cero y uno olvidaré
  • Ilústrame
  • Your fingers make me different
  • Haces que
  • mis sombras tengan un por qué
  • Tras tu mirada
  • puedo esconderme y bucear
  • Pero al final
  • parece que la red nos alcanzará

[Chorus Mantra]

  • Save your eyes
  • From the collective lie
  • Quiero que todo el mundo admire tu fuego,
  • pero créeme, acabarás entristeciendo
  • Una forma vulgar de olvidar el silencio,
  • tras ese cristal, lo real se ha hecho pequeño

[Chorus Mantra]

  • Save your eyes
  • From the collective lie
